original_title: Universal Ike Makes a Monkey of Himself
overview: Ike is made the ranch's cook. When a traveling theatrical troupe get stranded nearby, Ike asks them back to the ranch, mainly so he can get next to their pretty leading lady, but he finds that he has to compete for the girl's affections with her pet monkey.
tagline: It Was Plain That the Monkey Understood Ike's Tirade
title: Universal Ike Makes a Monkey of Himself
